article_title: Communication, a Declining Skill in Medical Diagnosis — Letters to the Editor
article_text:
Regarding Dr. Hardeep Singh's "The Battle Against Misdiagnosis" (op-ed, Aug. 8): I am a pediatrician in private practice for four decades. Dr. Singh's solution is very typical of current trends—a new protocol, and I doubt it will help.

The physician-patient encounter is the critical gateway to suspecting a more serious illness. What is required is clinical judgment, in essence, how sick does this child seem to me. It isn't a snap judgment—I may have to be in a room for a bit to get a sense that a particular...
